actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration Integrity, Security, and Enforcement

official_title: For the relief of Judge Neringa Venckiene, who the Government of Lithuania seeks on charges related to her pursuit of justice against Lithuanian public officials accused of sexually molesting her young niece.
short_title: Give Judge Venckiene Her Day in Court Act

summary.text: Provides for the relief of Judge Neringa Venckiene, who the Government of Lithuania seeks on charges related to her pursuit of justice against Lithuanian public officials accused of sexually molesting her young niece.

titles.title: Give Judge Venckiene Her Day in Court Act
